data.title: Southwest Airlines: Number of Employees 2010-2024 | LUV
data.meta_description:
Interactive chart of Southwest Airlines (LUV) annual worldwide employee count from 2010 to 2024.
  • Southwest Airlines total number of employees in 2023 was 74,806, a 12.23% increase from 2022.
  • Southwest Airlines total number of employees in 2022 was 66,656, a 20.97% increase from 2021.
  • Southwest Airlines total number of employees in 2021 was 55,100, a 2.48% decline from 2020.
  • Southwest Airlines total number of employees in 2020 was 56,500, a 7.07% decline from 2019.
